argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tgpconcomp.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | tgpconcomp.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tgpconcomp.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 4 |  | tgpconcomp.s | |- S = U. { x e. ~P X | ( .0. e. x /\ ( J |`t x ) e. Con ) } |
| 5 | 3, 1 | #P_tgptopon | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. J ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. J ) -> T e. J ) |
| 8 | 3 | #P_opnsubg | |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. J ) -> T e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_elind | |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. J ) -> T e. ( J i^i ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 10 | 2 | #P_subg0cl | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> .0. e. T ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. J ) -> .0. e. T ) |
| 12 | 4 | #P_concompclo | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ T e. ( J i^i ( Clsd ` J ) ) /\ .0. e. T ) -> S C_ T ) |
| 13 | 6, 9, 11, 12 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ T e. J ) -> S C_ T ) |
